title: Pattern For Embroidery
medium:
Printed pattern for Cut Fabric embroidery. Design is of two humans dressed as a rooster and a hen in a landscape.
Technique: A few preliminary running and stem stitches on a plain weave foundation.
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz
description: Printed pattern for Cut Fabric embroidery. Design is of two humans dressed as a rooster and a hen in a landscape.

tombstone.epitaph:
